speaker: President.
english: President. I understand the unusual situation in which we find ourselves, but unfortunately, according to the agenda, the debate on the Brok report will take place after statements by the Council and the Commission.
original: President. I understand the unusual situation in which we find ourselves, but unfortunately, according to the agenda, the debate on the Brok report will take place after statements by the Council and the Commission.
agenda_item: Results of the informal Council of foreign ministers (10-11 March 2006) (debate)
